1.content: So, are you a boy or a girl
1.title: Let’s begin

info.brief_description: Just as the title says, one feckin’ strange day
info.description:
Prepare for a strange day, you’re home from college for summer, and just one strange day, you and the people around you start changing, how and why they start changing may become evident as the story goes on.

What’s allowed
-weight gain
-tg
-expansions
-f/f m/m
-furries (not one myself, but I understand a lot of people are, just don’t make it all about furries)
-pretty much anything not in the next column

What’s not allowed
-Scat
-Watersports
-feet
-little kids
-vore
-basically, if it could be counted as incredibly gross to someone, I’ll most likely delete it with prior notice.
